page.title: About

blocks.content: Dr. Brar’s goal is to help patients gain insight, explore treatment options, and begin the healing process. She believes in collaboration when helping overcome issues, and extensively studies each patient’s medical and psychological background before recommending conventional and complementary therapies. Dr. Brar is passionate about her holistic approach to treating mental health, and her dedication shows in ongoing treatment results.
